sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import { css } from '@emotion/core' const WriteContainer = styled.div` padding-top: 50px; ` const WriteForm = styled.form` ` const WriteFormGroup = styled.div` margin-left: 150px; ` const WriteInput = styled.css` ` const WriteText = styled.css` ` const WriteSubmit = styled.css` ` export default function Write() { return ( ) }
